case_title: NASEEM HAIDER, JUNIOR DRAWING TEACHER, HIGH SCHOOL LOWAT, DISTRICT NEELUM, AZAD JAMMU AND KASHMIR vs SECRETARY EDUCATION, AZAD JAMMU AND KASHMIR MUZAFFARABAD and 7 others
court_name: Azad Jammu and Kashmir Service Tribunal
appellant: Naseem Haider, Junior Drawing Teacher, High School Lowat, District Neelum, Azad Jammu and Kashmir
respondents: Secretary Education, Azad Jammu and Kashmir Muzaffarabad

key_issues: Appointment made by an unauthorized authority.
Appellant removed without notice or hearing.
Replacement by Kh. Ejaz Ahmed, a regular employee.
court_findings: Director Education Schools (Technical) was not competent to issue the appointment order.
Divisional Director Schools is the appropriate authority for such appointments.
Initial appointment was temporary and flawed.
Termination order issued by competent authority and legally valid.
